patthana21.55:1.1: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:2.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:3.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:4.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:5.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:6.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:7.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:8.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:9.1: Nasavitakkaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avitakko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:10.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:11.1: Nasavicāraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca avicāro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:12.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:13.1: Nasappītikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasappītiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:14.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:15.1: Napītisahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napītisahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:16.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:17.1: Nasukhasahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:18.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:19.1: Naupekkhāsahagataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:20.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:21.1: Nakāmāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kāmāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:22.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:23.1: Narūpāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca narūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:24.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:25.1: Naarūpāvacaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naarūpāvacaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:26.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:27.1: Napariyāpannaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pariyāpanno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:28.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:29.1: Naniyyānikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyyāniko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:30.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:31.1: Naniyataṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca aniyato sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:32.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:33.1: Nasauttaraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sauttaro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:34.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:35.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:36.1: Naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:37.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca naaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighañca dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:38.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:39.1: (Anidassanasappaṭighe tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:40.1: Nasaraṇaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṁkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ…pe… avigate ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:41.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.55:42.1: Nasaraṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca araṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Nahetuyā ekaṁ, naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… nakamme ekaṁ, naāhāre naindriye najhāne namagge ekaṁ …pe… novigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:46.1: Nasaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Naaraṇo nasanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo araṇassa sanidassanasappaṭighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana21.55:47.1: Hetuyā dve, adhipatiyā dve …pe… sahajāte nissaye tīṇi, pacchājāte kamme dve, vipāke ekaṁ, āhāre indriye jhāne magge vippayutte dve …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.55:48.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṁ, evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
